
## Shear Stress

```{r shear-stress, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
ss1 = read_ss(file1, type1)
ss2 = read_ss(file2, type2)
ss.diff = diff_ss(ss1, ss2)
ss.rmse.station = rmse_ss(ss.diff, "Station")
ss.rmse.time = rmse_ss(ss.diff, "Time")

ss.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_ss) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Shear Stress Differences at Stations")
ss.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_ss) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Shear Stress RMSE at Stations")
ss.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_ss) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Shear Stress RMSE Through Time")
```
